querystring.select: SELECT A.APP_NO AS ApplicationNo,B.AGRMNT_NO AS AgreementNo,B.CUST_NAME AS CustName,B.PROD_OFFERING_NAME AS ProdOfferingName, C.TOP_DAYS AS TermOfPayment,E.MOU_CUST_NO AS MouCustNo, E.MOU_CUST_ID AS MouCustId, C.PAID_BY AS PaidBy, E.PLAFOND_AMT AS PlafonAmt, A.TENOR AS Tenor, F.DESCR AS InstallmentType, G.DESCR AS InstScheme, C.RETENTION_PRCNT AS Retention
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP A WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.AGRMNT B WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_ID = B.APP_ID JOIN dbo.APP_FCTR C WITH(NOLOCK) ON C.APP_ID = A.APP_ID JOIN dbo.MOU_CUST E ON E.MOU_CUST_ID = A.MOU_CUST_ID JOIN MOU_CUST_FCTR D ON D.MOU_CUST_ID = E.MOU_CUST_ID JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER F WITH(NOLOCK) ON D.MR_INST_TYPE_CODE = F.MASTER_CODE AND F.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'INST_TYPE' JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER G WITH(NOLOCK) ON D.MR_INST_SCHM_CODE = G.MASTER_CODE AND G.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'INST_SCHM'
